label: Huerta, Herón & Felipe Dzul.  2013. First record of the genus Abrhexosa Freeman from Mexico, with the description a new species, and two new species and new records of the genus Swammerdamella Enderlein (Diptera: Scatopsidae). Zootaxa 3693(1): 064–074.
value: Huerta, Herón & Felipe Dzul.  2013. First record of the genus Abrhexosa Freeman from Mexico, with the description a new species, and two new species and new records of the genus Swammerdamella Enderlein (Diptera: Scatopsidae). Zootaxa 3693(1): 064–074.
title: First record of the genus Abrhexosa Freeman from Mexico, with the description a new species, and two new species and new records of the genus Swammerdamella Enderlein (Diptera: Scatopsidae)
